name: Natália
text: In science, statistics, working with data, and their visualization are key skills that young researchers often lack. Winter Data School opened doors to the world of data, helped me overcome the fear of learning a programming language, and created a community.

name: Tomáš
text: One of the best trainings I've attended. Designed for both business and IT. The instructors guided a mixed group through practical exercises. Even non-technical users learned how to use tools like ChatGPT to generate Python code.

name: Iveta
text: Opened doors to new possibilities. I learned Python, which helps me solve errors in my daily PhD work efficiently. It was also a great networking opportunity.

name: Filip
text: Deepened my knowledge significantly. Practically oriented workshops advanced me considerably. I can now utilize methods from data preprocessing to machine learning to solve many problems.

name: Martina
text: Interactive approach, excellent lecturers, and a relaxed atmosphere. As a biologist without programming experience, I appreciated the clear explanations.

name: Monika
text: Provided a strong foundation in Python, enabling me to integrate data analysis into my research. These skills helped me win first prize for my poster at an international conference.

name: Laura
text: Winter Data School pre mňa znamenal veľký skok v dátovej analýze v Pythone. Taktiež mi lektori objasnili machine learning, čo mi otvorilo možnosti nových projektov v rámci mojej vedeckej kariéry.

name: Miroslav
text: Široký prehľad možností spracovávania dát s veľkým dôrazom na pridanú hodnotu. Najzaujímavejšia bola príležitosť spolupracovať na mini-hackathone a hľadali sme riešenie pre reálny problém na základe dát.

name: Ľubomír
text: Vedel som, že je to dobré rozhodnutie a rozumná investícia. 5 intenzívnych dní, ktoré aj absolventa s minimálnymi skúsenosťami uvedú do práce s dátami. Machine Learning a vizualizácia dát boli podané geniálne.
